K10D0278_H0280:127a-1: a'arya mam ga la aashta kam n'a ma ma h'a y'a na s'u tra /

K10D0278_H0280:127b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0278_H0280:127b-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang la la sngon gyi smon
K10D0278_H0280:127b-11: lam phun sum tshogs pa dag bzhugs pa /

K10D0278_H0280:127b-14: mi ma lags pa las 'jigs pa'am /
K10D0278_H0280:127b-15: gtse ba 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang /
K10D0278_H0280:127b-17: bdag rgyal po'i pho brang du mchis te /
K10D0278_H0280:127b-18: smra brjod pa na ci nas gang gis kyang smra
K10D0278_H0280:127b-19: ba la zlog pa mi bgyid cing zil gyis mi
K10D0278_H0280:127b-20: non pa dang / mtshan de dag nyid bdag 'dzin
K10D0278_H0280:127b-21: na gnyid kyis log na'ang sdig pa'i rmi lam rmi
K10D0278_H0280:127b-23: bdag mtshon cha gzas pa'i g-yul gyi nang du zhugs
K10D0278_H0280:127b-24: na'ang lus la mtshon cha rnams phog par mi 'gyur
K10D0278_H0280:127b-25: la / de las bde bar thar par yang 'gyur

K10D0278_H0280:128a-11: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0278_H0280:128a-12: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rtsal brtan don grub

K10D0278_H0280:128a-21: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0278_H0280:128a-22: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i rgyan gyi
K10D0278_H0280:128a-23: dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
K10D0278_H0280:128a-25: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams chad pa spangs pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10D0278_H0280:128b-0: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa @128b
K10D0278_H0280:128b-1: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dge bar grags
K10D0278_H0280:128b-2: pa dpal dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs so //

K10D0278_H0280:128b-6: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lhun po ltar 'phags
K10D0278_H0280:128b-7: pa rtsal rab grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
K10D0278_H0280:128b-9: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams dpal 'bar ba zhes bya ba yod de /

K10D0278_H0280:128b-11: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sems can thams cad

K10D0278_H0280:128b-14: shar phyogs na 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje grags pa dga' ba can zhes bya ba yod de /
K10D0278_H0280:128b-15: de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
K10D0278_H0280:128b-16: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yid tshim par mdzad
K10D0278_H0280:128b-17: pa rtsal rab grags pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs
K10D0278_H0280:128b-19: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag legs par rab tu gzung bar bya'o //
K10D0278_H0280:128b-23: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan mod kyi /
K10D0278_H0280:128b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
K10D0278_H0280:128b-26: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di dag gi sangs rgyas kyi
K10D0278_H0280:128b-27: zhing ni yongs su dag pa ste /
K10D0278_H0280:129a-1: rnams dang bral ba yin no //
K10D0278_H0280:129a-3: khyod kyis gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
K10D0278_H0280:129a-4: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di
K10D0278_H0280:129a-5: dag gi mtshan rnams blangs nas 'dzin na des yon
K10D0278_H0280:129a-6: tan gyi khyad par de dag dang gzhan dag tu'ang
K10D0278_H0280:129a-7: 'gyur te / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi
K10D0278_H0280:129a-8: mtshan 'di dag ni sngon gyi smon lam gyi yon
K10D0278_H0280:129a-9: tan dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0278_H0280:129a-10: nub mo srod la nyal na'ang khyod kyis mtshan 'di dag bsam par bya'o //
K10D0278_H0280:129a-11: ldang ba na'ang bsam par bya'o //
K10D0278_H0280:129a-12: 'jig rten gyi bya ba gang ci'ang rung ba dag
K10D0278_H0280:129a-13: rtsom pa dag na'ang thams cad la mtshan 'di dag
K10D0278_H0280:129a-14: bsam nas de'i 'og tu brtsams na der yang khyed
K10D0278_H0280:129a-15: la 'phel ba nyid du 'gyur gyi 'grib par ni
K10D0278_H0280:129a-16: ma yin par shes par bya ste /
K10D0278_H0280:129a-18: de nas li tsa b'i'i bu rtsal rab kyis bstan
K10D0278_H0280:129a-19: pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs
K10D0278_H0280:129a-20: te / rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang /
K10D0278_H0280:129a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan 'di dag yongs
K10D0278_H0280:129a-23: su brjod cing rin po che sna bdun gyi me
K10D0278_H0280:129a-24: tog brgyad stong gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par
K10D0278_H0280:129a-25: gtor te bskor pa'ang byas nas /
K10D0278_H0280:129a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa bkra
K10D0278_H0280:129a-27: shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ste
K10D0278_H0280:129a-28: bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas song ngo //

K10D0278_H0280:129b-1: 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa
K10D0278_H0280:129b-2: des bcom ldan 'das la phyag btsal nas /
K10D0278_H0280:129b-3: bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te /
K10D0278_H0280:129b-5: bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su
K10D0278_H0280:129b-6: brjod pa bkra shis brgyad pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs
K10D0278_H0280:129b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K10D0278_H0280:129b-10: de'i phyir khyod kyis lha dang /
K10D0278_H0280:129b-11: lha ma yin g-yul 'gyed pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su brjod par bya'o //
K10D0278_H0280:129b-12: yongs su brjod pa na lha'i dbang po khyod rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K10D0278_H0280:129b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang
K10D0278_H0280:129b-15: yin pa 'di ni bde zhing 'jigs pa med par
K10D0278_H0280:129b-16: yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0278_H0280:129b-17: mtshan yongs su brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni
K10D0278_H0280:129b-18: kun nas ldang ba med par yongs su brjod pa

K10D0278_H0280:129b-25: par 'das par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir
K10D0278_H0280:129b-26: ro // de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan yongs su brjod
K10D0278_H0280:129b-27: pa gang yin pa 'di ni zil gyis mi non
K10D0278_H0280:129b-28: par yongs su brjod pa dang /
K10D0278_H0280:130a-0: zhi bar yongs su brjod pa dang @130a *//

K10D0278_H0280:130a-2: 'jigs pa med par yongs su brjod pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
K10D0278_H0280:130a-3: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa'i phyir /
K10D0278_H0280:130a-4: bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog mand'a ra ba dag gis mngon par gtor nas /
K10D0278_H0280:130a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal
K10D0278_H0280:130a-6: te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas yid dga' ba
K10D0278_H0280:130a-8: sems sgrib pa med pa dang /
K10D0278_H0280:130a-9: sems kun nas ldang ba med pa dang /

K10D0278_H0280:130a-11: kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la byed bzhin du slad
K10D0278_H0280:130a-12: kyis kyang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong
K10D0278_H0280:130a-13: bar gyur cig ces tshig tu smras nas /
K10D0278_H0280:130a-14: sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi thad nas dong ngo //
K10D0278_H0280:130a-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas /
